What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?

Every country needs development which involves in emerging  global economy,As the countries are getting developed more and more there will  be some rapid changes in global economy.As the countries develop the revenues/taxes etc gets increased similarly the population also increases as revenue is more people from other places migrate to earn themselves,when people migrate themselves the productivity increases as a result revenue increases which plays a crucial part in changing the economic condtion of the country.

Similarly when many countries tend to develop the economic condition of all these countries have a major impact on the global economic conditions.

 Simply according to me "When Productivity Increases Revenue Increases" as a result economic condition of the country changes.
